---
title: "GraphGDPVietNam"
author: "Tran Nhat Han"
date: '2022-04-23'
output: html_document
---
```{r}
df = read.csv("GDP_VN.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
symnum(cor(df, use = "complete.obs"))
lm(GDP.Per.Capita.At.Foreign.Currency ~ ., df)
df$GDP.Per.Capita.At.Foreign.Currency[2] = -4.489e+03 + 
  2.136e-04*df$Total.GDP[2] + 
  4.426e-02*df$GDP.Per.Capita[2] + 
  2.312e+00*df$Year[2] + 
  4.646e-05*df$Gross.Capital.Formation[2] + 
  -1.988e-04*df$Final.Consumption[2] + 
  -1.061e-04*df$Export.Of.Goods.And.Services[2]
```

```{r}
library(pheatmap)   
pheatmap(cor(df), main="My Heatmap", cluster_cols=F, cluster_rows=F, )
```

```{r}
barplot(Total.GDP ~ Year, df, col = "yellowgreen")
```
